poem:
**The Digital Dance**

In the glow of screens  
we wade through words,  
brief touches of electrons,  
hollow embraces,  
a pixelated pursuit.  
Here, even ghosts  
disguise themselves  
as lovers, and  
reality—  
a silent witness  
to our yearning.  
Swipe-left dreams  
haunt intimate hopes  
in this vast   
machine of hearts.
